translated: The very generation of the Thought of Enlightenment is the essence.

original: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bsring par bya zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur to snyam mo zhes bya
analyzed: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bsring par bya zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur to snyam mo zhes bya
translated: Therefore, the Bodhisattva-MahƒÅsattva, because of the very generation of the Thought of Enlightenment, should keep far away from the levels of the ≈örƒÅvaka and the Pratyekabuddha, and should approach nearer to the knowledge of all modes.

original: ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: This is the conception of the essence.

original: 'di'i 'og nas mdo 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i tshig brgyad kyis gnyen po'i phyogs ni dngos su gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di'i 'og nas mdo 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i tshig brgyad kyis gnyen po'i phyogs ni dngos su gsungs so //
translated: The antidote side is stated directly in the following passage from the sutra, beginning with ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, it is thus.‚Äù

original: rigs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni dpe chos can dang 'dra ba dang dgag pa las bzlog pas shugs kyis bstan to //
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni dpe chos can dang 'dra ba dang dgag pa las bzlog pas shugs kyis bstan to //
translated: The conception of the family, etc., is indicated by implication, through the reversal of the example, the subject.

original: sgrub pa'i rten ni rigs yin te /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i rten ni rigs yin te /
translated: The basis of the practice is the family.

original: de bas na bdag dman pa'i byang chub bsring bar bya zhing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang nye bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na bdag dman pa'i byang chub bsring bar bya zhing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang nye bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: Therefore, I will keep far away from the inferior enlightenment and approach the enlightenment of the Buddhas.

original: ji @176b ltar na nam mkha' tha dad pa med pa de la cung zhig kyang nye ba dang / ring ba med pa de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rigs la zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs yin no //
analyzed: ji @176b ltar na nam mkha' tha dad pa med pa de la cung zhig kyang nye ba dang / ring ba med pa de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rigs la zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs yin no //
translated: Just as space, being undifferentiated, has nothing that is near or far, in the same way, in the family of the nature of the Dharma Realm.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o ;
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o ;
translated: The practice of the perfection of wisdom is the practice of the perfection of wisdom by the bodhisattva.

original: / sgrub pa dag gis yang dag par 'grub pa ni skyed pa ste /
analyzed: / sgrub pa dag gis yang dag par 'grub pa ni skyed pa ste /
translated: The attainment of the accomplishment is the generation.üîΩTherefore, I will keep far away from the inferior enlightenment and approach the enlightenment of the Buddhas.

original: de bas na bdag gis byang chub dman pa bsring bar bya zhing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang nye bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni yang dag par 'grub pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na bdag gis byang chub dman pa bsring bar bya zhing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang nye bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni yang dag par 'grub pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: This is the conception of attainment.

original: ji ltar sgyu ma'i skyes bu rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir 'di snyam du bdag las sgyu ma'i mkhan po nye ba dang ring bar mi sems pa de bzhin du rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di
analyzed: ji ltar sgyu ma'i skyes bu rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir 'di snyam du bdag las sgyu ma'i mkhan po nye ba dang ring bar mi sems pa de bzhin du rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di
translated: Just as the illusory person does not think, ‚ÄúThe magician is near me, or far away,‚Äù because of his non-conceptuality, in the same way, the one who practices the perfection of wisdom, which is non-conceptual,

original: snyam du bdag las dman pa'i byang chub ni ring la /
analyzed: snyam du bdag las dman pa'i byang chub ni ring la /
translated: does not think, ‚ÄúThe enlightenment of those inferior to me is far away,

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nye'o snyam du mi sems pa zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nye'o snyam du mi sems pa zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs te /
translated: and the enlightenment of the Buddha is near.‚Äù This is the antidote.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma yin te /
translated: It is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the one who practices the perfection of wisdom is non-conceptual.

original: shes pa'i dmigs pa ma 'khrul ba ni dmigs pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes pa'i dmigs pa ma 'khrul ba ni dmigs pa med pa nyid do //
translated: The non-error of cognition with respect to its object is the very absence of an object.

original: de bas na bdag las dman pa'i byang chub dang ring ba dang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang nye ba zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na bdag las dman pa'i byang chub dang ring ba dang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang nye ba zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the conceptualization of ‚Äúthe enlightenment of those inferior to me is far away, and the enlightenment of the Buddha is near‚Äù is non-objectification.

original: ji ltar bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan ni 'di snyam du bdag ni bzhin las gzhan pa dang ni ring la bzhin dang ni nye'o zhes mi sems pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan ni 'di snyam du bdag ni bzhin las gzhan pa dang ni ring la bzhin dang ni nye'o zhes mi sems pa ste /
translated: A reflection of a face does not think, ‚ÄúI am other than the face,‚Äù or ‚ÄúI am near the face,‚Äù or ‚ÄúI am far from the face.‚Äù

original: med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di snyam du bdag ni dman pa'i byang chub dang ring la /
analyzed: med pa'i phyir ro // de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di snyam du bdag ni dman pa'i byang chub dang ring la /
translated: Because it does not exist.üîΩIn the same way, one who practices the perfection of wisdom does not think, ‚ÄúI am far from the inferior enlightenment,‚Äù or ‚ÄúI am near the enlightenment of a buddha.‚Äù

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang nye'o snyam du mi sems so zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang nye'o snyam du mi sems so zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs yin te /
translated: This is the antidote.

original: yod pa ma yin zhes pa'i dmigs pa ni /
analyzed: yod pa ma yin zhes pa'i dmigs pa ni /
translated: The object of ‚Äúnonexistence‚Äù is

original: med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: nonexistence itself.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa ni gnyen po yin la /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa ni gnyen po yin la /
translated: Nonconceptual cognition is the antidote.üîΩConceptualization is the counteragent.

original: rnam par rtog pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: This is the conceptualization of the counteragent and the counteragent.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs su rtog pa mi mnga' ste /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs su rtog pa mi mnga' ste /
translated: Thus, the TathƒÅgata does not conceive of the counteragent and the counteragent.

original: chos kyi dbyings tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is just the sphere of reality.

original: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'o //üîΩde bas na bdag gis gnyen @177a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'o // de bas na bdag gis gnyen @177a * //
translated: Similarly, the perfection of wisdom is the antidote.üîΩTherefore, I will attain the exhaustion of the counteragent through the side of the antidote.

original: po'i phyogs las mi mthun pa'i phyogs zad pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i rang gis rtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: po'i phyogs las mi mthun pa'i phyogs zad pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i rang gis rtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: This is the conception of self-realization.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs so //
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs so //
translated: Just as the TathƒÅgata has abandoned all conceptions, so the perfection of wisdom is the antidote.

original: byang chub sems dpa' byed pa po dang de'i las gnyen po'i phyogs bsgom pa dang de'i bya ba'i 'bras bu mi mthun pa'i phyogs zad pa zhes bya ba ni byed pa dang las bya ba'i 'bras bu'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' byed pa po dang de'i las gnyen po'i phyogs bsgom pa dang de'i bya ba'i 'bras bu mi mthun pa'i phyogs zad pa zhes bya ba ni byed pa dang las bya ba'i 'bras bu'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva is the agent, the cultivation of the antidote is his action, and the result of that action is the exhaustion of the counteragent. This is the conception of action, agent, and the result of action.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir 'di snyam du bdag ni dman pa'i byang chub dang ring la /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir 'di snyam du bdag ni dman pa'i byang chub dang ring la /
translated: Just as the emanation of a Tathagata, because of its nonconceptuality, does not think, ‚ÄúI am far from the enlightenment of the disciples and Pratyekabuddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang ni nye'o snyam du mi sems pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang ni nye'o snyam du mi sems pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ngo //
translated: and I am near to the enlightenment of a Buddha,‚Äù so also is the perfection of wisdom.

original: ji ltar de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa rang gi bya ba byed kyang rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed kyang rnam par rtog par ni mi byed do //
analyzed: ji ltar de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa rang gi bya ba byed kyang rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed kyang rnam par rtog par ni mi byed do //
translated: Just as the emanation of a Tathagata performs its task without conceptualizing, so also the Bodhisattva who courses in the perfection of wisdom performs his task without conceptualizing.

original: ji ltar sprul pa bya ba de'i 'bras bu sgrub par byed kyang rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pas rnam par rtog pas zad par byed na yang rnam par mi rtog go zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i
analyzed: ji ltar sprul pa bya ba de'i 'bras bu sgrub par byed kyang rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pas rnam par rtog pas zad par byed na yang rnam par mi rtog go zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i
translated: Just as the emanation accomplishes the fruit of its action without conceptualizing, so also the perfection of wisdom, although it causes the extinction of all conceptualization, is itself nonconceptual.üîΩThis is the antidote to the third false notion.

original: phyogs so // de ni gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang po gnyen po dang bcas pa rnam pa dgu bstan pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs so // de ni gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang po gnyen po dang bcas pa rnam pa dgu bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the teaching of the first nine aspects of the conception of the apprehended, together with their antidotes.

original: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa'i rnam pa dgu gang zhe na /
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa'i rnam pa dgu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the nine aspects of the second conception of the apprehended?

original: srid dang zhi bar ltung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: srid dang zhi bar ltung ba'i phyir //
translated: Because of falling into existence and peace,

original: rtog pa dman pa nyid dang ni //
analyzed: rtog pa dman pa nyid dang ni //
translated: The inferior conception,üîΩThe lack of complete acceptance,üîΩThe incompleteness of practice,üîΩThe going by the conditions of others,üîΩThe perversion of the aim,

original: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang // sgrub pa'i rnam pa ma tshang dang // gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gro ba dang // ched du bya ba log pa dang // nyi tshe ba dang sna tshogs nyid //
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang // sgrub pa'i rnam pa ma tshang dang // gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gro ba dang // ched du bya ba log pa dang // nyi tshe ba dang sna tshogs nyid //
translated: The limited and the various,üîΩThe confusion about the abode and engagement,

original: gnas dang 'jug la rmongs pa dang // rjes la 'gro zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: gnas dang 'jug la rmongs pa dang // rjes la 'gro zhes bya ba la //
translated: And the following after.

original: rnam rtog dgu yi bdag nyid 'di //
analyzed: rnam rtog dgu yi bdag nyid 'di //
translated: This is said to be the ninefold conception.

original: ldog pa'i phyogs kyi rten can te //üîΩnyan thos la sogs yid las byung //
analyzed: ldog pa'i phyogs kyi rten can te // nyan thos la sogs yid las byung //
translated: It is based on the side of cessation,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: And arises from the minds of the sravakas and so forth.

original: dman pa pa ni zhan pa nyid do //
analyzed: dman pa pa ni zhan pa nyid do //
translated: The inferior is the weak.

original: rtog pa dman pa la sogs pa'i skyon byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya ba'i ngo bo rnam pa dgu ldog pa'i phyogs kyi rten can no //
analyzed: rtog pa dman pa la sogs pa'i skyon byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya ba'i ngo bo rnam pa dgu ldog pa'i phyogs kyi rten can no //
translated: The bodhisattva should abandon the nine kinds of faults, such as inferior imagination, etc.

original: srid pa dang zhi ba'i don du gnyer bas ma spangs pa nyid kyi phyir nyan thos la sogs pa'i yid la byung ba'o //
analyzed: srid pa dang zhi ba'i don du gnyer bas ma spangs pa nyid kyi phyir nyan thos la sogs pa'i yid la byung ba'o //
translated: The mental attention of the ≈õrƒÅvakas, etc. is not abandoned because it is not sought for the sake of existence or peace.

original: rdzas su yod pa la 'dzin pa mi dmigs @177b pa'i phyir 'khor ba ma yin /
analyzed: rdzas su yod pa la 'dzin pa mi dmigs @177b pa'i phyir 'khor ba ma yin /
translated: It is not samsara because it does not apprehend the existence of substantial reality.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa de bas na drug pa ci zhig bya zhes bya ba ni brgal ba'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa de bas na drug pa ci zhig bya zhes bya ba ni brgal ba'o //
translated: It is not nirvana because it is not the five perfections. Therefore, what is the use of the sixth? This is the objection.

original: drug pa rnam par rtog pa spong bar byed pas lan btab pa yin no //
analyzed: drug pa rnam par rtog pa spong bar byed pas lan btab pa yin no //
translated: The reply is given by the sixth, which eliminates conceptual differentiation.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po yod du zin kyang drug pa med na rtogs pa dman pa nyid la sogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa dman pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po yod du zin kyang drug pa med na rtogs pa dman pa nyid la sogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa dman pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: Even if the five perfections exist, if the sixth is absent, there is the inferiority of realization, etc. This is the conceptual differentiation of the inferiority of realization, etc.

original: de dag gi gnyen po'i phyogs ni //
analyzed: de dag gi gnyen po'i phyogs ni //
translated: The counteragent to these is as follows.

original: drug pa rnam par mi rtog pa kho na yin te /üîΩgang gi phan yon ni dang por de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: drug pa rnam par mi rtog pa kho na yin te / gang gi phan yon ni dang por de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The sixth is only non-conceptual.

original: ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs pa'o //
translated: The benefits of that are stated from ‚ÄúThen the venerable Subh≈´ti‚Äù up to ‚Äúit is wonderful!‚Äù

original: de nas 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i tshig gnyis kyis ni rtogs pa dman pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de nas 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i tshig gnyis kyis ni rtogs pa dman pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The two words ‚Äúthen like this‚Äù are a lesser realization.

original: de nas 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i tshig brgyad kyis ni rnam par rtog pa brgyad do //
analyzed: de nas 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i tshig brgyad kyis ni rnam par rtog pa brgyad do //
translated: The eight words ‚Äúthen like this‚Äù are the eight conceptual thoughts.

original: drug pa dang bral bas na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i ming yang mi thob pa de bas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par mi 'gyur zhing 'khor bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: drug pa dang bral bas na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i ming yang mi thob pa de bas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par mi 'gyur zhing 'khor bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is free from the sixth, it does not even get the name of the five perfections. Therefore, one will not attain the enlightenment of the Buddha obtained by the six perfections, and will fall into sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: zhi ba yang yod de rdzas su yod pa'i 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa dman pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba yang yod de rdzas su yod pa'i 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa dman pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: There is also peace, because the apprehension of substantial existence is not observed. This is a lesser realization.

original: lnga po dag drug pas yang dag par yongs su gzung na bdud la sogs pas mi tshugs pa yin la /
analyzed: lnga po dag drug pas yang dag par yongs su gzung na bdud la sogs pas mi tshugs pa yin la /
translated: If the five are well-embraced by the sixth, they cannot be overcome by demons, etc.üîΩIf the sixth does not exist, they do not exist.

original: drug pa med na de med do zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: drug pa med na de med do zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: This is the idea of the absence of a grasping subject.

original: de dag drug pa'i go bgos na bdud la sogs pas thub par dka' ba yin la /
analyzed: de dag drug pa'i go bgos na bdud la sogs pas thub par dka' ba yin la /
translated: If they are armored with the sixth, they are difficult to overcome by demons, etc.üîΩIf the sixth does not exist, they do not exist.

original: drug pa med na de med de zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i rnam pa mtshang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: drug pa med na de med de zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i rnam pa mtshang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: This is the idea of the absence of a subject who accomplishes.

original: rkyen gyi sgra ni rag las pa'i tshig go //üîΩgzhan gyi rkyen kho nas yin gyi /
analyzed: rkyen gyi sgra ni rag las pa'i tshig go // gzhan gyi rkyen kho nas yin gyi /
translated: The word ‚Äúcondition‚Äù is a word for dependence.üîΩIt should be understood that they are definitely only other-powered,

original: rang gi rgyud du ni ma yin no zhes nges par gzung bar yang khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi rgyud du ni ma yin no zhes nges par gzung bar yang khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: not self-powered.

original: de bas na de dag byang chub chen por drug pa la rag las pa kho nas yin gyi /
analyzed: de bas na de dag byang chub chen por drug pa la rag las pa kho nas yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, they are dependent only on the sixth for great enlightenment,üîΩnot on the absence of the sixth.

original: drug pa med par ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: drug pa med par ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: This is the idea of going by other-power.

original: chu bo gang g'as chu bran gzhan rgya mtshor 'jug pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu bgrod par bya ba'i phyir lnga po dag gi drug pa ni ched du bya ba yin te /
analyzed: chu bo gang g'as chu bran gzhan rgya mtshor 'jug pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu bgrod par bya ba'i phyir lnga po dag gi drug pa ni ched du bya ba yin te /
translated: The sixth is the aim of the five, like the Ganges river is the aim of the other streams that enter the ocean, in order to proceed to the enlightenment of the Buddha.

original: drug pa med na med do zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba ldog pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: drug pa med na med do zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba ldog pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The sixth is absent if the five are absent is the conceptual thought of the cessation of the aim.

original: drug pa ni thams cad du byed pa yin la lnga po dag ni @178a * //
analyzed: drug pa ni thams cad du byed pa yin la lnga po dag ni @178a * //
translated: The sixth is the universal, while the five are the particular.

original: phyogs gcig yin pa de bas na drug pa med par gang zag gi rdzas su mi dmigs su zin kyang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa zad par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: phyogs gcig yin pa de bas na drug pa med par gang zag gi rdzas su mi dmigs su zin kyang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa zad par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore, even though the person is not observed as a substance in the absence of the sixth, the obscuration of affliction is exhausted.

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nyi tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nyi tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: But the obscuration of the knowable is not is the conceptual thought of a limited scope.

original: lnga po drug pa'i nang du 'dus pa ni drug pa dang ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba de bas na de dag drug pa dag las tha mi dad la /
analyzed: lnga po drug pa'i nang du 'dus pa ni drug pa dang ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba de bas na de dag drug pa dag las tha mi dad la /
translated: The five are included in the sixth, because they are of one taste with the sixth.

original: drug pa med na tha dad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: drug pa med na tha dad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: If the sixth were not to exist, they would be different.

original: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpung gi tshogs ni 'khor lo rin po che 'gro ba dang 'dug pa med par gnas pa dang 'jug pa la 'gro zhing gnas pa med de /
analyzed: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpung gi tshogs ni 'khor lo rin po che 'gro ba dang 'dug pa med par gnas pa dang 'jug pa la 'gro zhing gnas pa med de /
translated: For example, the army of a wheel-turning king, without the precious wheel moving or stopping, remains in one place and moves, but the precious wheel does not move or remain in one place by itself.

original: bdag nyid kyis mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not know itself.üîΩIn the same way, the sixth, omniscience, moves and remains in one place in the five, but the five do not move or remain in one place without the sixth.

original: de bzhin du drug pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir 'gro ba dang de nyid la gnas na lnga po drug pa'i rjes su 'brang ba la drug pa med na med do zhes bya ba ni gnas pa dang 'jug pa la rmongs pa'i rnam par
analyzed: de bzhin du drug pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir 'gro ba dang de nyid la gnas na lnga po drug pa'i rjes su 'brang ba la drug pa med na med do zhes bya ba ni gnas pa dang 'jug pa la rmongs pa'i rnam par
translated: This is the conception of delusion regarding remaining and entering.

original: rtog pa'o // mig dang ldan pa bzhin du drug pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir sngon du 'gro bar byed la phyis long ba bzhin du lnga po des khrid par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rtog pa'o // mig dang ldan pa bzhin du drug pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir sngon du 'gro bar byed la phyis long ba bzhin du lnga po des khrid par 'gyur te /
translated: Like one with eyes, the sixth, omniscience, goes first, and later the five lead like one blind.

original: drug pa med na 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rjes la 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: drug pa med na 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rjes la 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: If the sixth does not exist, there is no going. This is the subsequent conceptual thought.

original: 'bras bu la rgyu nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu la rgyu nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the effect is figuratively designated as the cause.

original: de ni gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa'i rnam pa dgu yin no //
analyzed: de ni gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa'i rnam pa dgu yin no //
translated: This is the ninefold aspect of the second conceptual thought that apprehends the apprehended.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po'i rnam pa dgu gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po'i rnam pa dgu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the nine aspects of the first conceptual thought that apprehends the apprehender?

original: 'dzin dang so sor gtong ba dang // yid la byed dang khams rnams ni //
analyzed: 'dzin dang so sor gtong ba dang // yid la byed dang khams rnams ni //
translated: Apprehending, giving away, mental activity, and the three realms,üîΩConnection, abode, manifest attachment,üîΩDesignation as the entity of phenomena,üîΩattachment, and antidotes,

original: gsum char nye bar 'brel pa dang // gnas dang mngon par zhen pa dang // chos kyi dngos por btags pa dang // chags pa dang ni gnyen po dang // ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'gro nyams la //
analyzed: gsum char nye bar 'brel pa dang // gnas dang mngon par zhen pa dang // chos kyi dngos por btags pa dang // chags pa dang ni gnyen po dang // ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'gro nyams la //
translated: going as one wishes, and degeneration

original: 'dzin pa dang por shes par bya //
analyzed: 'dzin pa dang por shes par bya //
translated: should be known as the first apprehending.

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: It is said:

original: 'dzin pa dang so sor gtong ba la sogs pa dgu'i chos la 'dzin pa rdzas kyi rnam par rtog pa ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dgu'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa dang so sor gtong ba la sogs pa dgu'i chos la 'dzin pa rdzas kyi rnam par rtog pa ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dgu'o //
translated: The nine dharmas of apprehending, giving away, and so on are the nine conceptual thoughts that apprehend the substance of apprehending.

original: de dag kyang 'phags pa dag gis spangs pa nyid kyi phyir so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: de dag kyang 'phags pa dag gis spangs pa nyid kyi phyir so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams so //
translated: Since they are abandoned by the noble ones, they are the qualities of ordinary people.

original: de dag gi gnyen po ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin du drug pa ste /
analyzed: de dag gi gnyen po ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin du drug pa ste /
translated: Their antidote is the sixth, as in the sutra:

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: non-conceptuality.

original: de la gsol pa /üîΩbcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: de la gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: Regarding that, it is said:

original: mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar ni @178b 'dzin pa dang gtong ba'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: mi 'dzin mi gtong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar ni @178b 'dzin pa dang gtong ba'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: Bhagavan, the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom should not apprehend... up to should not abandon. This is the conception of apprehending and abandoning.

original: gnyen po'i phyogs dang bcas par brjod do //üîΩgsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: gnyen po'i phyogs dang bcas par brjod do // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
translated: It is expressed along with its antidote.

original: 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //üîΩgsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /üîΩchos gang dang yang 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis khams gsum char dang nye bar 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas / chos gang dang yang 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis khams gsum char dang nye bar 'brel pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: Bhagavan, the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom should not attend to... up to should not attend to form. This is the conception of attention.

original: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Bhagavan, the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom should not mix with... up to should not mix with any dharma. This is the conception of mixing with the three realms.üîΩBhagavan, the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom should not mix with... up to should not mix with any dharma. This is the conception of mixing with the three realms.

original: gnas par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //üîΩgsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: gnas par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The passage up to does not abide is the conceptualization of abiding.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i //üîΩgal te yang zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i // gal te yang zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The passage beginning The Lord said up to practices the perfection of wisdom is the conceptualization of clinging.

original: de ni gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis dngos por btags pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o //üîΩde nas tshe dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de ni gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis dngos por btags pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o // de nas tshe dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The passage beginning If, moreover, up to that is not possible is the conceptualization of imputation as a thing.

original: spyod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis chags pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //üîΩgsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: spyod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis chags pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The passage beginning Then the venerable Subh≈´ti up to practices is the conceptualization of attachment.

original: gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gnyen po'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gnyen po'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The passage beginning The Lord said up to abides is the conceptualization of the antidote.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The passage beginning Subh≈´ti, it is thus up to the perfection of wisdom is the conceptualization of the object.

original: der gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro ba las nyams pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: der gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro ba las nyams pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The phrase they will remain there is the conception of falling from the desired realm.

original: de ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po rnam pa dgu'o //
analyzed: de ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po rnam pa dgu'o //
translated: These are the nine types of the first conception of grasping.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa rnam pa dgu gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis pa rnam pa dgu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the nine types of the second conception of grasping?

original: ched bzhin nges par mi 'byung dang // lam dang lam min nges 'dzin med //
analyzed: ched bzhin nges par mi 'byung dang // lam dang lam min nges 'dzin med //
translated: Not going as intended, not ascertaining the path and not the non-path,üîΩgrasping at birth with cessation, grasping at things with and without,üîΩgrasping at abodes and types, grasping at aims and causes,

original: 'gag dang bcas pa'i skye ba dang // dngos po ldan dang mi ldan dang // gnas dang rigs ni 'dzin pa dang // don du gnyer dang rgyu med dang // phyir rgol ba dang dmigs pa la //
analyzed: 'gag dang bcas pa'i skye ba dang // dngos po ldan dang mi ldan dang // gnas dang rigs ni 'dzin pa dang // don du gnyer dang rgyu med dang // phyir rgol ba dang dmigs pa la //
translated: and grasping at opponents and focal objects

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gzhan yin no //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gzhan yin no // zhes gsungs te /
translated: are other conceptions of grasping.

original: btags par yod pa'i 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa ni 'dir drug pa'o //
analyzed: btags par yod pa'i 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa ni 'dir drug pa'o //
translated: The non-observation of the grasping of imputed existence is the sixth here.

original: de med pa ni ched du bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa thal bar 'gyur ba dgu ni rnam par rtog pa dgu pa'o //
analyzed: de med pa ni ched du bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa thal bar 'gyur ba dgu ni rnam par rtog pa dgu pa'o //
translated: If they did not exist, there would be no definite emergence in accordance with the purpose, and so on. These nine consequences are the nine discriminations.

original: de dag kyang so so'i skye bo'i chos ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag kyang so so'i skye bo'i chos ma yin te /
translated: And these are not the qualities of ordinary beings,

original: de dag la dang po nyid yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag la dang po nyid yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they have the first.

original: de lta na ni su'i zhe na /üîΩ'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin te /
analyzed: de lta na ni su'i zhe na / 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin te /
translated: If that is so, whose are they?

original: de dag @179a * //
analyzed: de dag @179a * //
translated: They are the qualities of the noble disciples and pratyekabuddhas,üîΩbecause

original: gis ni ma spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gis ni ma spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: they have not abandoned them.

original: mdo ji lta ba bzhin du de dag gi gnyen po'i phyogs ni drug pa de kho na yin te //
analyzed: mdo ji lta ba bzhin du de dag gi gnyen po'i phyogs ni drug pa de kho na yin te //
translated: The antidote to them is the sixth, just as in the sutra.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nges par 'byung ba'i phyir drug pa ni lnga po dag gi kha lo sgyur ba yin la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nges par 'byung ba'i phyir drug pa ni lnga po dag gi kha lo sgyur ba yin la /
translated: The sixth is the guide for the five, because it definitely emerges to the enlightenment of the Buddha.

original: drug pa med na dman pa'i byang chub la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ched ji lta ba bzhin ngas par mi 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: drug pa med na dman pa'i byang chub la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ched ji lta ba bzhin ngas par mi 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: This is the conception of non-emergence in accordance with one's aim.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste zhes bya ba nas /
translated: As it is said, Subhuti, it is thus:

original: mnyam pa nas 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nas 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: up to they go in the same way.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la /
translated: The path of the knowledge of all modes is the Bodhisattva's path.üîΩThe paths of the sravakas, etc. are not their paths.

original: nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam ni de dag gi lam ma yin no zhes bya ba ni lam dang lam ma yin pa nges par gzung ba yin la /
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam ni de dag gi lam ma yin no zhes bya ba ni lam dang lam ma yin pa nges par gzung ba yin la /
translated: This is the determination of the path and the non-path.üîΩIf the sixth were not present, that would not be.

original: drug pa med par de med do zhes bya ba ni lam dang lam ma yin pa la nges par 'dzin pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: drug pa med par de med do zhes bya ba ni lam dang lam ma yin pa la nges par 'dzin pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: This is the conception of the non-determination of the path and the non-path.

original: tshig snga ma'i mjug la dgag pa'i yi ge sbyar te yod pas so //
analyzed: tshig snga ma'i mjug la dgag pa'i yi ge sbyar te yod pas so //
translated: The negative particle is added to the end of the previous phrase, because it is present.

original: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Subhuti said: Lord, if all dharmas are like a dream, like a magical illusion, like an echo, like a flash of lightning, like an apparition, like the moon in water, like an optical illusion, like a reflected image, like a village of the Gandharvas, like an emanation, and if all dharmas are empty of own-marks, then, Lord, how can Bodhisattvas, who have set out for many hundreds of thousands of niyutas of kotis of aeons, and who have fulfilled the perfections of giving, morality, patience, vigour, and meditation, and who have fulfilled the perfection of wisdom, and who have fulfilled the four applications of mindfulness, etc. to : the Buddhadharmas, and who have fulfilled the fruit of a Streamwinner, etc. to : the supreme enlightenment?

original: lam dang lam ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: lam dang lam ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: The path and not the path up to here.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag pa ma yin pa la drug pa med na skye ba dang 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang 'gog pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag pa ma yin pa la drug pa med na skye ba dang 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang 'gog pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not the origination or cessation of any dharma.  If there is no sixth, origination and cessation will occur is the concept of origination and cessation.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
translated: He said, Blessed One, up to here.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: One should exert oneself in the six perfections.

original: de dag la ji ltar brtson par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de dag la ji ltar brtson par bya zhe na /
translated: How should one exert oneself in them?

original: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar ro //
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar ro //
translated: From form up to omniscience, neither conjoined nor disjoined is like that.

original: drug pa med na de med do zhes bya ba ni ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: drug pa med na de med do zhes bya ba ni ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: If there is no sixth, it does not exist is the concept of conjoined and disjoined.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
translated: He said, Blessed One, up to here.

original: brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: The passage from one should not stand in the perfection of giving up to one should not stand in the perfection of wisdom indicates the perfection of effort.

original: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni brtson pa yin la /
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni brtson pa yin la /
translated: The passage from one should not stand in form up to one should not stand in the knowledge of all modes indicates the perfection of effort.

original: drug pa med na de dag la gnas par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: drug pa med na de dag la gnas par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: If the sixth perfection is absent, one stands in those [first five perfections]. This is the discrimination of standing.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o //üîΩ@179b rigs ni sa bon yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o // @179b rigs ni sa bon yin te /
translated: The passage from Moreover, Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, should course in perfect wisdom up to should fully know the knowledge of all modes indicates the perfection of wisdom.üîΩThe passage from The perfection is the seed up to if the sixth perfection is absent, it is destroyed indicates the discrimination of seed.üîΩThe passage from The perfection is the seed up to if the sixth perfection is absent, it is destroyed indicates the discrimination of seed.üîΩThe passage from The perfection is the seed up to if the sixth perfection is absent, it is destroyed indicates the discrimination of seed.

original: de 'dir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yin la drug pa med na de rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rigs 'jig pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /üîΩrab 'byor 'di lta ste zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de 'dir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yin la drug pa med na de rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rigs 'jig pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste / rab 'byor 'di lta ste zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The passage from The perfection is the seed up to if the sixth perfection is absent, it is destroyed indicates the discrimination of seed.üîΩThe passage from The perfection is the seed up to if the sixth perfection is absent, it is destroyed indicates the discrimination of seed.üîΩThe passage from The perfection is the seed up to if the sixth perfection is absent, it is destroyed indicates the discrimination of seed.üîΩThe passage from The perfection is the seed up to if the sixth perfection is absent, it is destroyed indicates the discrimination of seed.üîΩThe passage from The perfection is the seed up to if the sixth perfection is absent, it is destroyed indicates the discrimination of seed.üîΩThe passage from The perfection is the seed up to if the sixth perfection is absent, it is destroyed indicates the discrimination of seed.

original: 'khor ba las yongs su bsgral bar zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba las yongs su bsgral bar zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: The passage from The perfection is the seed up to if the sixth perfection is absent, it is destroyed indicates the discrimination of seed.

original: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'dod pa la sogs pa'i don du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'dod pa la sogs pa'i don du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of not being dependent on others, and so on, one should train in the six perfections.üîΩIf the sixth were not there, the pursuit would not be accomplished.

original: drug pa med na don du gnyer ba 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni don du gnyer ba med pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /üîΩrab 'byor de ltar na zhes bya ba nas /

original: chos thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur gyi /

analyzed: skye ba dngos po med par shes pa ni skye ba shes pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of the non-production of things is the knowledge of non-production.üîΩIt is said:üîΩThe Blessed One said, ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateway of bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattvas is like this.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /

original: @180b gzungs ngas bstan pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o //

translated: It is called the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ of emptiness.üîΩWhat is the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ of emptiness?üîΩSubh≈´ti, bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattvas should practice the perfection of wisdom in this way.üîΩWhat is the perfection of wisdom?üîΩSubh≈´ti, it is the non-production of form, the non-production of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.üîΩWhat is the non-production of form?

original: de ga las shes she na /
analyzed: de ga las shes she na /
translated: What is the non-production of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness?üîΩSubh≈´ti, form is empty of form.üîΩFeeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are empty of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.üîΩSubh≈´ti, form is not different from emptiness, and emptiness is not different from form.üîΩForm itself is emptiness, and emptiness itself is form.üîΩFeeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are also like this.üîΩSubh≈´ti, all dharmas are empty of inherent nature.üîΩThis emptiness does not arise and does not cease.üîΩIt is not defiled, not purified, not diminished, not increased.üîΩIn emptiness, there is no form, no feeling, no perception, no formation, no consciousness.üîΩThere is no eye, no ear, no nose, no tongue, no body, no mind.üîΩThere is no form, no sound, no smell, no taste, no touch, no dharmas.üîΩThere is no eye element up to no mind consciousness element.üîΩThere is no ignorance and also no ending of ignorance up to no aging and death and also no ending of aging and death.üîΩThere is no suffering, origin, cessation, path; no wisdom, no attainment, and also no non-attainment.

translated: The thought that the extinction of conceptualizations through the antidote and the non-arising of future conceptualizations is enlightenment, the knowledge of extinction and non-arising, is clarified by the treatise-maker.

original: mthong zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni //
analyzed: mthong zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni //
translated: The path called ‚Äúseeing‚Äù

original: rnam par rtog rigs ci zhig zad //
analyzed: rnam par rtog rigs ci zhig zad //
translated: Does not extinguish any conceptualization

original: skye med rnam pa ci zhig 'thob //
analyzed: skye med rnam pa ci zhig 'thob //
translated: And does not obtain any non-arising.

original: gzhan gyi chos rnams kyang yod la //
analyzed: gzhan gyi chos rnams kyang yod la //
translated: Other phenomena also exist,

original: ston pa la yang shes bya yis //
analyzed: ston pa la yang shes bya yis //
translated: And the teacher also exists,

original: sgrib pa zad par brjod pa gang //
analyzed: sgrib pa zad par brjod pa gang //
translated: So how can it be said that obscurations are extinguished?

original: de la kho bos mtshar du brtsis //üîΩ'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
analyzed: de la kho bos mtshar du brtsis // 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
translated: I find this amazing.üîΩThere is nothing to be removed

original: bsnan par bya ba ci yang med//üîΩyang dag nyid la yang dag lta //üîΩyang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
analyzed: bsnan par bya ba ci yang med// yang dag nyid la yang dag lta // yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
translated: And not the slightest to be added.üîΩActual reality is to be seen as it is.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: If it is seen as it is, one is liberated.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic identity is the reality of phenomena.

original: rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: It is their intrinsic reality.

original: de yang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
analyzed: de yang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
translated: And that is without beginning or end.

original: de bas na mthong ba'i lam gyis rnam par rtog pa'i rigs ci zhig zad pa'am skye ba med pa gang yang thob pa med do //
analyzed: de bas na mthong ba'i lam gyis rnam par rtog pa'i rigs ci zhig zad pa'am skye ba med pa gang yang thob pa med do //
translated: Therefore, the path of insight does not attain any cessation or non-arising of any conceptual categories whatsoever.

original: ji ltar chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni yod pa yin la de bzhin du ston pa de dag gi shes bya'i sgrib pa zad pa yin no zhes gzhan gyis brjod pa gang yin pa 'di la kho bos ngo mtshar du brtsis pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni yod pa yin la de bzhin du ston pa de dag gi shes bya'i sgrib pa zad pa yin no zhes gzhan gyis brjod pa gang yin pa 'di la kho bos ngo mtshar du brtsis pa yin te /
translated: I consider it a wonder that others say, ‚ÄúJust as the characteristics of phenomena exist, so too the knowable objects of those who teach are exhausted.‚Äù

original: de dag gi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag gi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The characteristics of those do not exist as they are,

original: dpyad mi bzod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dpyad mi bzod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they cannot withstand scrutiny.

original: de bzhin du shes bya'i sgrib pa yang zad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes bya'i sgrib pa yang zad pa ma yin te /
translated: Likewise, the obscurations of the knowable are not exhausted,

original: khyad par byed pa log pa'i shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs su mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par byed pa log pa'i shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs su mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the antidote to the obscurations of the knowable is not suitable as a special agent.

original: gang gi phyir mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sna tshogs pa chos nyid tsam yin pa'i rgyu de'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa bsal zhing dor bar bya ba ci yang med cing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sna tshogs pa chos nyid tsam yin pa'i rgyu de'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa bsal zhing dor bar bya ba ci yang med cing /
translated: Because of the emptiness of characteristics, the diversity is mere reality. For that reason, there is nothing to be removed, nothing to be added, which would be the counteragent.

original: gnyen po'i phyogs su gyur pa bsnan par bya ba cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: gnyen po'i phyogs su gyur pa bsnan par bya ba cung zad kyang med de /
translated: There is not the slightest thing to be added, which would be the counteragent.

original: skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of non-arising.

original: 'o na ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: Well then, what should be done?

original: yang dag nyid du yang dag lta ste /
analyzed: yang dag nyid du yang dag lta ste /
translated: One should see reality in reality.

original: sna tshogs pa chos kyi dbyings tsam nyid du de ltar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa chos kyi dbyings tsam nyid du de ltar blta bar bya'o //
translated: The diversity should be seen in that way as mere reality.

original: de de ltar mthong na shes bya'i sgrib pa las kyang grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de de ltar mthong na shes bya'i sgrib pa las kyang grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one sees it in that way, one will also be liberated from the obscurations of the knowable.

original: de la 'dir mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma du zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dir mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma du zhe na /
translated: Here, how many moments are there in the path of seeing?

original: sbyin pa la sogs re re la //üîΩde dag phan tshun bsdus pa gang //
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs re re la // de dag phan tshun bsdus pa gang //
translated: Each of generosity and so forthüîΩis included in each other.

original: skad cig gcig pa'i bzod pa yis //
analyzed: skad cig gcig pa'i bzod pa yis //
translated: That which is included in the single moment of acceptance

original: bsdus pa de 'dir mthong ba'i lam//
analyzed: bsdus pa de 'dir mthong ba'i lam//
translated: is here the path of seeing.

original: @181b zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: @181b zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa la'o //
translated: Here means in the realization of the peak.

original: skad cig ma gcig ni mthong ba'i lam mo //
analyzed: skad cig ma gcig ni mthong ba'i lam mo //
translated: One moment is the path of seeing.

original: de yang bzod pas bsdus pa yin gyi shes pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang bzod pas bsdus pa yin gyi shes pas ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is included in acceptance, not in knowledge.

original: re re'i sgra las rang gi don la zlos pa'i rkyen byung ba de bas na /
analyzed: re re'i sgra las rang gi don la zlos pa'i rkyen byung ba de bas na /
translated: From the word each, the condition of repetition in its own meaning arises.

original: sbyin pa la sogs re re la gnas pa'o ;
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs re re la gnas pa'o ;
translated: Therefore, each of generosity and so on is a stage.

original: / de dag ces bya ba ni rang las gzhan pa lnga po dag bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: / de dag ces bya ba ni rang las gzhan pa lnga po dag bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Those means the five others that are included in oneself.

original: phan tshun zhes bya ba ni gcig la gcig go //
analyzed: phan tshun zhes bya ba ni gcig la gcig go //
translated: Mutual means one with another.

original: re re ni drug tshan te /
analyzed: re re ni drug tshan te /
translated: Each is a group of six.

original: bsdu bar bya ba dang sdud par byed pa dag drug tshan nang 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsdu bar bya ba dang sdud par byed pa dag drug tshan nang 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the objects to be included and the includers are confused within each group of six.

original: de ni mthong ba'i lam yin te //üîΩbcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar na zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: de ni mthong ba'i lam yin te // bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar na zhes bya ba nas /
translated: That is the path of seeing.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: As the BhagavƒÅn said, ‚ÄúHow do bodhisattvas abide in the perfection of wisdom?

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa'o //
translated: up to ‚Äúone takes up the perfection of meditative stabilization.‚Äù

original: 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du bsdus nas gang gsungs pa de bstan bcos mdzad pas /üîΩde nas seng ge rnam bsgyings pa'i //
analyzed: 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du bsdus nas gang gsungs pa de bstan bcos mdzad pas / de nas seng ge rnam bsgyings pa'i //
translated: Here, the author of the treatise, having summarized the perfection of wisdom up to the perfection of meditative stabilization,üîΩsays:

original: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas //
translated: Then, having entered into the meditative absorption of the lion‚Äôs sport,

original: rten cing 'brel 'byung lugs mthun dang // lugs mi mthun la rtog par byed //üîΩces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel 'byung lugs mthun dang // lugs mi mthun la rtog par byed // ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he contemplates the forward and reverse processes of dependent origination.

original: don las cung zhig nyung ba las khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: don las cung zhig nyung ba las khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that this is slightly abbreviated from the s≈´tra.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni drug tshan drug pa'i cung zhig nyung ba las 'og tu seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' de mdo ji lta ba bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la so sor
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni drug tshan drug pa'i cung zhig nyung ba las 'og tu seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' de mdo ji lta ba bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la so sor
translated: ‚Äú Then‚Äù means that, having entered into the meditative absorption of the lion‚Äôs sport, slightly abbreviated from the sixth of the six sets of six, the bodhisattva contemplates dependent origination in the forward and reverse processes, just as in the s≈´tra.

original: rtog par byed do //
analyzed: rtog par byed do //
translated: One imagines.

original: lugs mi mthun zhes bya ba ni lugs las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: lugs mi mthun zhes bya ba ni lugs las bzlog pa'o //
translated: The reverse order is the opposite of the natural order.üîΩThe concentration of the lion‚Äôs sport is taught in the sutras after the six sets of six.

original: seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin de yang mdo drug tshan drug pa'i 'og tu gsungs la de'i 'og tu thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin gsungs te /
analyzed: seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin de yang mdo drug tshan drug pa'i 'og tu gsungs la de'i 'og tu thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin gsungs te /
translated: The concentration of alternating meditative attainment is taught after that.

original: thod rgal de ni bsgom pa'i lam yin no //
analyzed: thod rgal de ni bsgom pa'i lam yin no //
translated: That alternating meditative attainment is the path of meditation.

original: de yang bstan bcos mdzad pas /üîΩ'gog dang bcas pa'i snyoms 'jug dgur //
analyzed: de yang bstan bcos mdzad pas / 'gog dang bcas pa'i snyoms 'jug dgur //
translated: The author of the treatise states:üîΩHaving gone and returned in two ways

original: rnam pa gnyis su song 'ongs nas ;
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis su song 'ongs nas ;
translated: in the nine meditative attainments that include cessation,

original: /'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par shes //üîΩmnyam gzhag min pa'i mtshams bzung ste //
analyzed: /'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par shes // mnyam gzhag min pa'i mtshams bzung ste //
translated: the consciousness belonging to the desire realmüîΩis arrested in the formless realm.

original: thod rgal du ni snyoms 'jug pa //
analyzed: thod rgal du ni snyoms 'jug pa //
translated: Alternating meditative attainment

original: gcig dang gnyis gsum bzhi dang lnga //
analyzed: gcig dang gnyis gsum bzhi dang lnga //
translated: skips over one, two, three, four, five,

original: drug dang bdun dang brgyad rgal nas //
analyzed: drug dang bdun dang brgyad rgal nas //
translated: six, seven, and eight

original: 'gog pa'i bar du mi 'drar 'gro //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /üîΩyin @182a * //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i bar du mi 'drar 'gro // zhes bya ba gsungs te / yin @182a * //
translated: and goes to the different levels up to cessation.

original: zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: How is it?

original: snyoms par 'jug pa dgur rnam pa gnyis su song nas so //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa dgur rnam pa gnyis su song nas so //
translated: Having gone in two ways into the nine meditative attainments,

original: ji ltar dgur song nas she na /
analyzed: ji ltar dgur song nas she na /
translated: How has he gone in nine ways?

original: 'gog pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i bar du'o //
translated: Up to the cessation.

original: 'gog pa'i mthar byas pa ni bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa bzhi dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i mthar byas pa ni bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa bzhi dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: up to the end of cessation, that is, the four meditations, the four formless attainments, and the attainment of cessation.

original: de ni 'gro ba gcig yin te //
analyzed: de ni 'gro ba gcig yin te //
translated: That is one going.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Subhuti, what is the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva's skipping meditative stabilization?

original: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas te zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o ;
analyzed: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas te zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa'o ;
translated: Up to: having actualized the cessation of discriminations and feelings, he abides.

original: / ji ltar na yang dgur song ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: / ji ltar na yang dgur song ba yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that he has gone in nine ways?

original: 'gog pa dang bcas pa'i gcig dang / gnyis dang gsum dang / bzhi dang lnga dang / drug dang bdun dang / brgyad rnam par rgal ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa dang bcas pa'i gcig dang / gnyis dang gsum dang / bzhi dang lnga dang / drug dang bdun dang / brgyad rnam par rgal ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Having skipped over one with cessation, two, three, four, five, six, seven, up to eight.

original: 'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par shes //
analyzed: 'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par shes //
translated: Consciousness belonging to the desire realm.

original: mnyam gzhag min pa'i mtshams bzung ste //
analyzed: mnyam gzhag min pa'i mtshams bzung ste //
translated: It is said that he enters the attainment of cessation from a mind that is not in meditative equipoise.

original: zhes bya ba ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems kyi mthar thug par 'gro bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems kyi mthar thug par 'gro bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that he proceeds to the end of a mind that is not in meditative equipoise.

original: de ni 'gro ba gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: de ni 'gro ba gnyis pa ste /
translated: This is the second type of person.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas /
translated: Having arisen from the attainment of cessation,

original: bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya ba nas /
translated: he enters meditative stabilization in the first concentration.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
translated: Having arisen from the attainment of cessation, he abides in a mind that is not in meditative equipoise.

original: 'dir snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad po re re zhing 'gog pa'i rjes la snyoms par 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: 'dir snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad po re re zhing 'gog pa'i rjes la snyoms par 'jug pa yin la /
translated: Here, after each of the eight meditative attainments, there is an attainment of cessation.

original: dgu pa la ni snyoms par 'jug par mi nus te /
analyzed: dgu pa la ni snyoms par 'jug par mi nus te /
translated: In the ninth, one is not able to enter the attainment of cessation,

original: 'gog pa las 'gog par ldang ba ni mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gog pa las 'gog par ldang ba ni mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not logical to arise from cessation and enter cessation.

original: de bas na nye ba'i phyir dang shugs kyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la snyoms par zhugs nas de las langs te /
analyzed: de bas na nye ba'i phyir dang shugs kyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la snyoms par zhugs nas de las langs te /
translated: Having come from there, one enters meditative attainment in the nine meditative attainments.üîΩWhat is the nature of the mind that is not in meditative equipoise?

original: 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs shing de las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so zhes bya ba ni song ba gnyis te rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs shing de las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so zhes bya ba ni song ba gnyis te rdzogs so /
translated: It is a mind that is not in meditative equipoise and is of a different type.üîΩIt is a mind that is not in meditative equipoise that has arisen from a mind that is in meditative equipoise.üîΩHaving come from there, one enters meditative attainment in the nine meditative attainments.üîΩWhat is the nature of the mind that is not in meditative equipoise?üîΩIt is a mind that is not in meditative equipoise and is of a different type.üîΩIt is a mind that is not in meditative equipoise that has arisen from a mind that is in meditative equipoise.

original: // /'ongs nas zhes bya ba ni gang du song nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas pa de las 'ongs pa de nyid ni snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yin no //
analyzed: // /'ongs nas zhes bya ba ni gang du song nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas pa de las 'ongs pa de nyid ni snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yin no //
translated: Having come from there, one enters meditative attainment in the nine meditative attainments.

original: ci 'dra bar gyur pa zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'dra bar gyur pa zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of the mind that is not in meditative equipoise?

original: mi 'dra bar 'gro ba ni rigs mi 'dra bar 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: mi 'dra bar 'gro ba ni rigs mi 'dra bar 'gro ba ste /
translated: It is a mind that is not in meditative equipoise and is of a different type.üîΩIt is a mind that is not in meditative equipoise that has arisen from a mind that is in meditative equipoise.üîΩHaving come from there, one enters meditative attainment in the nine meditative attainments.üîΩWhat is the nature of the mind that is not in meditative equipoise?üîΩIt is a mind that is not in meditative equipoise and is of a different type.üîΩIt is a mind that is not in meditative equipoise that has arisen from a mind that is in meditative equipoise.

original: mnyam par @182b ma bzhag pa las mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang mnyam par bzhag pa las mnyam par ma bzhag par 'phos par gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mnyam par @182b ma bzhag pa las mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang mnyam par bzhag pa las mnyam par ma bzhag par 'phos par gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Having come from there, one enters meditative attainment in the nine meditative attainments.üîΩWhat is the nature of the mind that is not in meditative equipoise?üîΩIt is a mind that is not in meditative equipoise and is of a different type.üîΩIt is a mind that is not in meditative equipoise that has arisen from a mind that is in meditative equipoise.

original: 'ongs nas zhes bya ba 'di la yang //
analyzed: 'ongs nas zhes bya ba 'di la yang //
translated: Having come from there, one enters meditative attainment in the nine meditative attainments.

original: 'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par shes //
analyzed: 'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par shes //
translated: What is the nature of the mind that is not in meditative equipoise?

original: mnyam gzhag min pa'i mtshams bzung ste //
analyzed: mnyam gzhag min pa'i mtshams bzung ste //
translated: and from the attainment of the non-concentrated state.

original: zhes bya ba de dag rjes su sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba de dag rjes su sbyar ro //
translated: These are the words that are to be supplied.

original: de bas na bsam gtan dang po las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so //
analyzed: de bas na bsam gtan dang po las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so //
translated: Therefore, having arisen from the first meditation, he abides in the non-concentrated state.

original: de ltar gnyis su song ba'i 'og tu lan cig phyir 'ong ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar gnyis su song ba'i 'og tu lan cig phyir 'ong ba ste /
translated: In this way, after having gone to the second, he is a once-returner.üîΩHaving arisen from the non-concentrated state, he enters the attainment of cessation, and so on up to:

original: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las langs nas 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya ba nas /üîΩbsam gtan dang po las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las langs nas 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya ba nas / bsam gtan dang po las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa ste /
translated: having arisen from the first meditation, he abides in the non-concentrated state.

analyzed: sbyor ba'i rnam pa'i spyod yul can //

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /

original: gcig ste zhes bya ba ni dang po'o //
analyzed: gcig ste zhes bya ba ni dang po'o //

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni rnam pa ste /

analyzed: khyad par gang yin pa de'i spyod yul can te /
translated: That which is the distinction is the domain of that.

original: de'i yul can no //
analyzed: de'i yul can no //

analyzed: mdor bsdus pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid la sogs pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis so //

original: rgyas par ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rgyas par ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis so //

original: de dag mi shes pa ni bsdus pa dang rgyas pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o//üîΩ@183a * // gang dag gi gnyen po dang ni gnas mang po la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba nas /

analyzed: 'dod par gtogs pa'i zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bstang bas yongs su gzung ba gang yin pa de med par rnam par rtog pa ni rtog pa'o //

analyzed: sbyor ba'i lam gyi dus dang mthong ba'i lam gyi dus dang bsgom pa'i lam gyi dus kyi yon tan med par rnam par rtog pa ni rtog pa'o //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //üîΩ'di ni gzugs so zhes pa nas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so // 'di ni gzugs so zhes pa nas /
translated: up to ‚Äúone should practice the perfection of wisdom.‚Äù

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar ni chos rnam par 'byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar ni chos rnam par 'byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThis is form,‚Äù up to ‚Äúthis is the knowledge of all aspects‚Äù is the discrimination that has the nature of the discernment of phenomena.üîΩThe antidote to that is the discrimination of the thorough discrimination of phenomena.üîΩThe equality of the objective support and the nonobjective support is the side of the antidote.

original: de'i gnyen po'i phyogs ji ltar dmigs su med pa de ltar de dag rab tu dbye bar bya'o zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gnyen po'i phyogs ji ltar dmigs su med pa de ltar de dag rab tu dbye bar bya'o zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: Because both are nonapprehended, it is thus.

original: gnyi ga ni gsol pa /üîΩbcom ldan 'das gal te zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: gnyi ga ni gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das gal te zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Both say,

analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad rtogs par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
translated: ‚ÄúBhagavan, if it is thus,‚Äù up to ‚Äúone does not realize all phenomena.‚Äù

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po gzugs kyi don du bcom ldan 'das ma la spyod ces bya ba ni dngos po'i ched kyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po gzugs kyi don du bcom ldan 'das ma la spyod ces bya ba ni dngos po'i ched kyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The phrase one does not practice the perfection of wisdom for the sake of form, etc. is the antidote.

original: gzugs kyi don du mi spyod do zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gnyen po'i phyogs so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi don du mi spyod do zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gnyen po'i phyogs so //
translated: The phrase one does not practice for the sake of form is the antidote.

original: gnyi ga ni gsol pa /üîΩbcom ldan 'das gal te zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: gnyi ga ni gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das gal te zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Both of them said:üîΩBhagavan, if one does not practice for the sake of form, etc., how does one practice the perfection of wisdom?

original: ma byas rnam par ma byas mngon par 'du ma byas pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
analyzed: ma byas rnam par ma byas mngon par 'du ma byas pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
translated: The Bhagavan said, One should practice the perfection of wisdom in the manner of not doing, not making, and not producing.

original: theg pa gsum la gnas pas zhes bya bas ni theg pa gsum gyi rnam par rtog pa yin la /
analyzed: theg pa gsum la gnas pas zhes bya bas ni theg pa gsum gyi rnam par rtog pa yin la /

analyzed: de'i gnyen po'i phyogs ni chos cung zad gnas pa yang mi dmigs so zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: The antidote to that is the phrase one does not apprehend even the slightest dharma that abides.

original: de gnyi ga ni gsol pa /
analyzed: de gnyi ga ni gsol pa /
translated: Both of them said:

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Bhagavan, if one does not practice for the sake of form, etc., how does one practice the perfection of wisdom?

original: sprul pa lta bur yid ches par byas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //üîΩgal @184b te de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa lta bu yin na de la ji ltar yon dag par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni yon ma dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid tshad mar byas nas
analyzed: sprul pa lta bur yid ches par byas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so // gal @184b te de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa lta bu yin na de la ji ltar yon dag par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni yon ma dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid tshad mar byas nas
translated: One should practice the perfection of wisdom, having confidence that it is like a magical creation.üîΩIf the Tathagata is like a magical creation, how can there be purity of offerings to him?üîΩThis is the conception of impurity of offerings.üîΩThe antidote to that is:

original: zhes bya ba gang yin pa ni gnyen po'i phyogs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gang yin pa ni gnyen po'i phyogs so //
translated: The name of the Tathagata, and the reality of the Tathagata, should be taken as authoritative.

original: gnyi ga ni gsol pa /
analyzed: gnyi ga ni gsol pa /
translated: Both of them said:

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar sprul pa zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar sprul pa zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Blessed One, if it is like a magical creation, up to

analyzed: bye brag gang yang med par bya ste zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos nyid la 'jug pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi chos nyid do zhes bya ba ni spyod pa rnam par 'khrug pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos nyid la 'jug pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi chos nyid do zhes bya ba ni spyod pa rnam par 'khrug pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //

analyzed: rnam par 'khrug pa ni tha dad par 'byed pa ste /

analyzed: de nyid rnam par rtog pa'o // gang gi gnyen po'i phyogs ni rab 'byor de ltar zhes bya ba nas /

original: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so /üîΩchos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bya ba nas /
analyzed: gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so / chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bya ba nas /
translated: The antidote to that is taught by the passage beginning with ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, it is thus‚Äù and ending with ‚Äúone does not apprehend a change from the abiding.‚Äù

analyzed: rnam par 'khrug pa mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gnyen po'i phyogs bstan pa'o //

analyzed: 'khrug pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni shugs kyis khong du chud par bya'o //
