translated: The other is the second aspect of the conceptualization of the apprehender.üîΩHow is it ninefold?üîΩBecauseüîΩof the three knowledges,üîΩthe three obscurations,

analyzed: gi phyir / thams cad mkhyen nyid gsum dag gi // bdag nyid ji bzhin sgrib rnam gsum //

analyzed: rmongs zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The so-called obscurations are of the nature of obscurations.üîΩThe last is the last of the conceptualizations of the apprehended and the apprehender.üîΩBecause of the three knowledges,üîΩthe three obscurations,üîΩthe path of peace, suchness, and so on,üîΩthe possessed and the unpossessed,üîΩthe unequal, suffering, and so on,üîΩthe nature of the afflictions,üîΩand nonduality,üîΩthe conceptualization is considered the last.üîΩThe so-called obscurations are of the nature of obscurations.

analyzed: thams cad mkhyen nyid gsum dag gi //
translated: the three obscurations,üîΩthe path of peace, suchness, and so on,üîΩthe possessed and the unpossessed,üîΩthe unequal, suffering, and so on,üîΩthe nature of the afflictions,üîΩand nonduality,üîΩthe conceptualization is considered the last.

original: bdag nyid ji bzhin zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bdag nyid ji bzhin zhes bya ba la /
translated: The so-called obscurations are of the nature of obscurations.üîΩThe last is the last of the conceptualizations of the apprehended and the apprehender.üîΩBecause of the three knowledges,

analyzed: rang rang dang 'brel pa'i sgrib pa rnam pa gsum ste /

analyzed: rmongs pa'o // de la rnam par rtog pa ni gsol pa /

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rmongs pa'o //üîΩrab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du zhes bya ba nas /

translated: In this regard, the concealer is the obscuration of the knowledge of all modes, as is stated in the passage beginning Bhagavan, with regard to the knowledge of all modes... and ending the perfect Buddhas....üîΩSubhuti, with regard to what you have said... and ending the Bodhisattva, the great being, should know all the paths.

original: lam thams cad du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni thams cad shes pa nyid la rmongs pa'o //üîΩgsol pa / bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /

translated: The concealer is the obscuration of the knowledge of all modes, as is stated in the passage beginning Subhuti said, 'Bhagavan, why is it...?' and ending not on all paths.üîΩThe concealer is the obscuration of the knowledge of paths, as is stated in the passage beginning Subhuti said, 'Bhagavan, why is it...?' and ending not on all paths.üîΩThe concealer is the obscuration of the knowledge of all modes, as is stated in the passage beginning Subhuti said, 'Bhagavan, why is it...?' and ending not on all paths.

original: ci'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis zhi ba'i lam la rmongs pa ste /
analyzed: ci'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis zhi ba'i lam la rmongs pa ste /
translated: up to here is the confusion about the path to peace.

original: 'dir yang gang la gnas nas zhi ba mngon sum du byed pa de ni zhi ba'i lam zhes bya ba ste rmongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang gang la gnas nas zhi ba mngon sum du byed pa de ni zhi ba'i lam zhes bya ba ste rmongs pa'o //
translated: Here, the path to peace is called the confusion about the path to peace, because one abides in it and actualizes peace.

original: gang yang gnas med pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs yin te /
analyzed: gang yang gnas med pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs yin te /
translated: And the antidote to that is the statement, ‚ÄúSince there is no abiding anywhere, one should actualize the limit of reality.‚Äù

original: des kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na nyid zhi ba yin te /
analyzed: des kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na nyid zhi ba yin te /
translated: And that is the perfection of wisdom itself, which is peace.

original: 'ga' zhig la yang gnas pa med do zhes bya ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la yang gnas pa med do zhes bya ba bstan pa'o //
translated: It is taught that there is no abiding anywhere.

original: lhag ma ni zhar las 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni zhar las 'ongs pa'o //
translated: The rest is extraneous.

original: de bzhin nyid la sogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ldan pa dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /

analyzed: gang gi gnyen po'i phyogs ni rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The antidote to that is from Subh≈´ti, moreover‚Ä¶üîΩup to‚Ä¶

analyzed: mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro zhes @185b bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
translated: up to ‚Äúbecause of the single characteristic of the absence of characteristic.‚Äù

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lam gzhan mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni mi mnyam pa nyid la rmongs pa'o /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lam gzhan mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni mi mnyam pa nyid la rmongs pa'o /
translated: The ‚Äúsameness of the path‚Äù of the perfection of wisdom is the delusion that there is no sameness.

original: gang gi gnyen po'i phyogs ni rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: gang gi gnyen po'i phyogs ni rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The antidote to that is from ‚ÄúFurthermore, Subh≈´ti,‚Äù up to

analyzed: don la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
translated: ‚Äúone should practice in the meaning.‚Äù

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal la sogs pa la spyad par mi bya zhes bya ba la rmongs pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal la sogs pa la spyad par mi bya zhes bya ba la rmongs pa ste /
translated: The delusion that ‚Äúone should not practice impermanence, suffering, and so on, by practicing the perfection of wisdom‚Äù

original: gang gi gnyen po'i phyogs ni rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: gang gi gnyen po'i phyogs ni rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The antidote to that is from ‚ÄúFurthermore, Subh≈´ti,‚Äù up to

analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
translated: ‚Äúone should practice in the meaning of the perfection of wisdom.‚Äù

original: don yang ma yin don med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: don yang ma yin don med pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yin te /
translated: The meaning is not a meaning, nor is it a non-meaning refers to the nature of the afflictions.

analyzed: de la rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o // gang gi gnyen po'i phyogs ni gsol pa /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /

analyzed: gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //

original: gnyis dang gnyis med pa mi dmigs pa ni gnyis med pa'i ngo bo yin te /
analyzed: gnyis dang gnyis med pa mi dmigs pa ni gnyis med pa'i ngo bo yin te /
translated: The non-apprehension of duality and non-duality is the nature of non-duality.

original: gang gi thob par 'gyur ba de la rmongs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi thob par 'gyur ba de la rmongs pa ste /
translated: The delusion about that which is to be attained is:

original: de nyid kyi ni rnam par rtog pa'o //üîΩgang gnyen po'i phyogs ni gsol pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi ni rnam par rtog pa'o // gang gnyen po'i phyogs ni gsol pa /
translated: That is the conceptualization.

original: bcom ldan 'das ci lags zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ci lags zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The question about the antidote is: Bhagavan, what is the antidote to the afflictions?

original: sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su grol bar byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
analyzed: sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su grol bar byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
translated: The answer is from Bhagavan up to completely liberates from grasping sentient beings.

original: 'dir yang bcom 'das kyis mi dmigs pa na zhes gsungs pa gnyis dang gnyis med pa mi dmigs pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dir yang bcom 'das kyis mi dmigs pa na zhes gsungs pa gnyis dang gnyis med pa mi dmigs pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Here also, the Blessed One's statement, when not apprehended, is made from the perspective of the non-apprehension of duality and non-duality. This is the meaning.

original: de ltar na 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis ni don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa nyid la rnam par rtog pa nyid yin pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis ni don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa nyid la rnam par rtog pa nyid yin pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Thus, since the two conceptualizations of grasping are conceptualizations that do not accord with reality, the bodhisattva's practice would be pointless.

original: 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He said this...

original: byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa 'di la don med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa 'di la don med pa ma yin te /
translated: The bodhisattva's practice of austerities is not pointless in this case.

original: 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The intention is that it is for the sake of accomplishing the desired goal.

original: de ltar na 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dgu bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dgu bstan to //
translated: Thus, the nine conceptualizations of grasping are presented.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa sum cu rtsa drug gnyen po dang bcas pa legs par bstan na yon tan du 'gyur ba ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa sum cu rtsa drug gnyen po dang bcas pa legs par bstan na yon tan du 'gyur ba ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked how it is that it is virtuous to teach well the thirty-six concepts to be abandoned by the path of meditation together with their antidotes,üîΩit is said:

original: yams nad 'di rnams zad nas ni //
analyzed: yams nad 'di rnams zad nas ni //
translated: When these epidemics are exhausted,

original: yun rings lon nas dbugs phyin ltar //üîΩrnam pa kun tu 'gro ba @186a * //
analyzed: yun rings lon nas dbugs phyin ltar // rnam pa kun tu 'gro ba @186a * //
translated: after a long time, it is like finding relief.üîΩAll the qualities of accomplishing

original: yi ; / bde sgrub yon tan phun tshogs kun //
analyzed: yi ; / bde sgrub yon tan phun tshogs kun //
translated: the happiness of all beings

original: rgya mtsho che la chu bo bzhin //üîΩ'bras bu mchog gis pa ba yi //
analyzed: rgya mtsho che la chu bo bzhin // 'bras bu mchog gis pa ba yi //
translated: are like the great ocean for the four rivers.üîΩThe great being who has the supreme result

original: sems dpa' chen po de la ni //
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po de la ni //
translated: is always attended by

original: rnam pa kun tu sten par byed //
analyzed: rnam pa kun tu sten par byed //
translated: all the qualities of accomplishing the happiness of all beings.

original: ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is said.

original: gang mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnam par rtog pa bdun cu rtsa gnyis po 'di bstan nas /
analyzed: gang mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnam par rtog pa bdun cu rtsa gnyis po 'di bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the seventy-two concepts to be abandoned by the path of seeing and the path of meditation,

original: yams nad de dag nyid yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung ba'i gegs nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di rnams zad par gyur na'o //
analyzed: yams nad de dag nyid yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung ba'i gegs nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di rnams zad par gyur na'o //
translated: when those epidemics are exhausted, they are the very obstacle to the arising of all the qualities.
